name: Sweet Tooth (olivieryc)
description:
Sweet Tooth

A puzzle platformer about single use. A girl needs her ice cream! Use your friends (literally) to achieve your snacking objectives!

Controllers or Keyboard/Mouse

  • Use controllers for more fun!
  • WASD to move
  • Right Click to push
  • Left Click to come

Entry for the KiwiJam 2018 edition, made by:

  • James Veugelaers
  • Jess Ong
  • Rohin Knight
  • David Randall Peters
  • Olivier Chrun
